item.title: Global Tech Radar - Data Collection and Analysis
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Build a data-driven system to track and analyze the adoption, maturity, and stability of technologies across the global tech ecosystem, creating a dynamic tech radar that provides real-time insights into technology trends.
